abstract: Profile of Myles Mack, senior guard at Rutgers who has continued to play basketball at a high level and maintain a strong sense of character despite repeated losses, a coaching scandal and other setbacks.
lead_paragraph: The senior guard Myles Mack survived a coaching scandal, teammates’ defections and lots of losing, yet he remained “a strong person.”

headline.main: Senior Myles Mack Doesn’t Regret Choosing Rutgers
headline.print_headline: Despite Bumpy Road, a Rutgers Senior Is Grateful

snippet: The senior guard Myles Mack survived a coaching scandal, teammates’ defections and lots of losing, yet he remained “a strong person.”

keywords.value: Rutgers, The State University of New Jersey
keywords.name: organizations
